mapper.insert: INSERT INTO revenue( beverage_no, beverage_price, create_date ) VALUES( ${beverageNo}, ${beveragePrice}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT r.revenue_no AS revenueNo, r.beverage_no AS beverageNo, b.beverage_name AS beverageName, b.beverage_type AS beverageType, r.beverage_price AS beveragePrice, r.create_date AS createDate FROM revenue AS r LEFT JOIN beverage AS b ON r.beverage_no = b.beverage_no ORDER BY createDate
